author: CBC News
title: How Russia is being excluded from the worlds of sports and culture after invading Ukraine | CBC News
description: Russia became further isolated from the Western world Friday as sports bodies cancelled events planned there, Eurovision said it would ban the country from its song contest and some shops pulled Russian products from their shelves.
content:
Russia became further isolated from the Western world Friday as sports bodies cancelled events planned in the country and some shops pulled Russian products from their shelves.
